description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Job_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Job_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Job_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Job Category. Only needed when updating the Reference ID for the Job Category.

Job_Category_Data.description: A unique identifier for the job category.
Free form text describing a job category.
Boolean which indicates if the Job category is inactive.

description: Wrapper element that encapsulates the Job Category Data
